thread.title: Matthew Trudell
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Matthew Trudell

author: Matthew Trudell
title: Matthew Trudell
text: We had a great experience all around. The salesman in the store was very helpful and friendly. The delivery men were great as well, very professional and polite. I would recommend Gardner White to others and will definitely go back for my next furniture purchase
